name: BlockPosHelper
description: The BlockPosHelper class is a helper class for working with block positions in Minecraft. It provides a convenient way to manipulate block coordinates, calculate distances, and perform spatial operations within the game world.
overview: The BlockPosHelper class is a helper class for working with block positions in Minecraft. It provides a convenient way to manipulate block coordinates, calculate distances, and perform spatial operations within the game world. This class wraps Minecraft's internal BlockPos class and exposes additional functionality useful for scripting.

constructors.description: Creates a new BlockPosHelper from an existing Minecraft BlockPos object.

parameters.name: blockPos
parameters.description: The original Minecraft BlockPos to wrap

constructors.description: Creates a new BlockPosHelper with the specified coordinates.

methods.name: getX
methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of the block position.

methods.name: getY
methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of the block position.

methods.name: getZ
methods.description: Returns the Z coordinate of the block position.

methods.name: up
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block directly above (Y + 1).

methods.name: up
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block n levels above.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Number of blocks to move upward

methods.name: down
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block directly below (Y - 1).

methods.name: down
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block n levels below.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Number of blocks to move downward

methods.name: north
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block to the north (Z - 1).

methods.name: north
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block n blocks to the north.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Number of blocks to move north

methods.name: south
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block to the south (Z + 1).

methods.name: south
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block n blocks to the south.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Number of blocks to move south

methods.name: east
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block to the east (X + 1).

methods.name: east
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block n blocks to the east.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Number of blocks to move east

methods.name: west
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block to the west (X - 1).

methods.name: west
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper representing the block n blocks to the west.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Number of blocks to move west

methods.name: offset
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper offset by one block in the specified direction.

methods.name: offset
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper offset by n blocks in the specified direction.

methods.name: offset
methods.description: Returns a new BlockPosHelper offset by the specified coordinate values.
examples:
// Search in a 5x5x5 cube around a position
const checkPos = centerPos.offset(dx, dy, dz);

methods.name: toNetherCoords
methods.description: Converts the current block position to corresponding Nether coordinates (X/8, Y, Z/8).

methods.name: toOverworldCoords
methods.description: Converts the current block position to corresponding Overworld coordinates (X*8, Y, Z*8).
examples:
// Convert back to Overworld
const backToOverworld = netherPos.toOverworldCoords(); // (800, 64, 1600)

methods.name: toPos3D
methods.description: Converts the block position to a Pos3D object with double precision.

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates the distance from this block position to an entity.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity to calculate distance to

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates the distance from this block position to another block position.

parameters.name: blockPos
parameters.description: The block position to calculate distance to

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates the distance from this block position to a Pos3D position.

parameters.name: pos3D
parameters.description: The Pos3D position to calculate distance to

methods.name: distanceTo
methods.description: Calculates the distance from this block position to the specified coordinates.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Compares this BlockPosHelper with another object for equality.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns the hash code for this block position.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this block position.

methods.name: getRaw
methods.description: Returns the underlying Minecraft BlockPos object (inherited from BaseHelper).
